meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of sexual desire or arousal.
meanings.sent1: The movie had an erotical scene that made me feel uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: She wrote an erotical story that captivated her readers.
meanings.sent3: The erotical painting caused quite a stir at the art exhibition.
meanings.sent4: His voice had an erotical quality that drew people in.
meanings.sent5: The perfume had an erotical scent that lingered in the air.

meanings.definition: Involving or depicting sexual activity or content.
meanings.sent1: The book had an erotical cover that caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The movie was filled with erotical scenes that left little to the imagination.
meanings.sent3: The erotical advertisement caused a scandal in the conservative town.
meanings.sent4: Her dance had an erotical rhythm that mesmerized the audience.
meanings.sent5: The painting depicted an erotical moment frozen in time.
